chapter.text: Alloh savgand jod mekunad: Savgand ʙa ançiru zajtun
va savgand ʙa kūhi Turi Sino, ki dar on ço Alloh ʙevosita ʙo Mūso alajhissalom suxan guft
Savgand ʙa in şahri emin az hamai xavf, ki Makka ast
ki mo odamiro ʙa tahqiq dar nekūtarin surate ʙijofaridem
On goh ūro ʙa sūi dūzax gardonidem, agar az ito'ati Parvardigoraş va az pajravii rasuli Alloh rūj gardonad
magar onon, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi şoista kardaand, pas ʙaroi onon podoşi ʙepojon ast
Ej inson, pas cist, ki ʙa'd az in hama pandu nasihat turo ʙa durūƣ şumoridani qijomat vomedorad
Ojo Alloh hukmkunandatarini hokimon nameʙoşad dar hama cize, ki ofaridast? Bale alʙatta meʙoşad
